Title: Bugged
Plot: After a break-in at the Alpha House, the NSA does a sweep, and gets suspicious -- which lands Robert a new covert mission.  Meanwhile, Gil John goes to bat for the women's caucus bill, earning him a whole new following.  And Louis's aides inspire him to publicly "evolve" on gay marriage, much to their chagrin.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
GuestStars: Yara Martinez, Alicia Sable, Brooke Bloom, Ben Rameaka, Penn Jillette, Wanda Sykes, Richard Cox, Natalie Gold, William Thomas Evans, Janel Moloney, Tony Plana, Marylouise Burke, Christopher McLinden, Bianca Amato
